creator: Borino Games
descriptionHtml:
Tired of spending your evenings switching games every 15 minutes? Old Story was made for you! Our party game contains more than 1000 cards created to help you have an unforgettable night and let you learn to know each other.

Our game contains a standard version to start the evening easily with soft and interesting cards, but also a hot version that will allow you to raise the temperature
descriptionShort: Have an exceptional evening while learning to know each other

appDetails.developerAddress: 19 rue de l'Oratoire, 69300 Caluire-Et-Cuire, Rhône-Alpes, France
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Suppression d'un bug d'affichage survenant au lancement de la première partie
- Corrections de divers bugs d'affichage mineurs
- Ajout d'un écran de fin de partie
- Ajout de la possibilité de tester des cartes d'un mode Premium, une fois par partie

title: Old Story - Drinking Game

container.value: 19 rue de l'Oratoire, 69300 Caluire-Et-Cuire, Rhône-Alpes, France

creator: Borino Games
descriptionHtml:
Tired of spending your parties looking for a new drinking games every 15 minutes? Old Story is there for you!

Our drinking game contains more than 1000 cards that will allow you to have a wonderful night while getting to know your friends better.

Our drinking game contains a standard version that will allow you to start your evening easily with soft and interesting cards, but also a hot version which will allow you to raise the temperature and untie the tongues to let you know about all your friend’s secrets.

Old Story was made so that a maximum of players can answer the questions and do the different given pledges.

Unlike many other drinking games, we can ensure you won’t see the same cards repeating again and again.

The Standard and Hot versions are composed of different alcohol games belonging to 9 categories:
• Truth or Dare
• 10 seconds
• Never have I ever
• According to you
• Would you rather
• Theme game
• Mini-games
• Special games

All these cards were designed to tighten the links between the players, Old Story isn’t only a drinking game, but a partner which will help you create real friendships, or maybe even more…

Let yourself be tempted by Old Story and spend unforgettable parties with your friends thanks to our drinking game
descriptionShort: Have an exceptional party and learn to know each other

appDetails.developerAddress: 19 rue de l'Oratoire, 69300 Caluire-Et-Cuire, Rhône-Alpes, France
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Couple mode is now available
- New mini game added
- You can now invite your friends to get free Premium games
- Improvement of the cards picking algorithm to prevent repetitions during a game session
